SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'false' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_QJ_PERSON SELECT DISTINCT T2.UNIT_NAME, T3.REALNAME AS NAME, #{job_type} AS JOB_TYPE, #{job} as JOB, T3.HR_ID, #{emp_type} AS EMP_TYPE, T2.UNIT_ID, #{user_code} as USER_CODE, T2.GROUP_ID_1, T4.GROUP_ID_1_NAME, '86000' AS GROUP_ID_0, #{time} AS ACTIVE_TIME, '' AS INACTIVE_TIME, '1' AS IS_VALUE, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') AS DEAL_DATE ,0 is_logo FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T2 JOIN PORTAL.APDP_USER T3 ON (#{hr_id} = T3.HR_ID) join PCDE.TB_CDE_REGION_CODE T4 ON (T2.GROUP_ID_1 = T4.GROUP_ID_1)
WHERE T2.UNIT_NAME = #{unit_name} AND T2.GROUP_ID_1 = #{code} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_QJ_PERSON T5 WHERE #{hr_id}=T5.HR_ID AND T5.IS_VALUE='1' AND T5.DEAL_DATE=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm'))
